original_title: デリヘルでみつけたドM天使-実写版- 辻井ほのか 松本いちか 椿りか
overview: The first live-action version of the masterpiece title that has sold over 50,000 copies drawn by the popular doujin circle "Seimizuan"! Deriheru senior hero has sex with de M girls who are outrageously hit by an order of magnitude. In the blink of an eye, lewd M women are fascinated by the main character.
title: Dominant angel found in a deli – live action version – Honoka Tsujii, Ichika Matsumoto, Rika Tsubaki
